overview: Duos de Choc is a realistic reportage of six scenes about the truths and lies behind casting sessions with adult studios - good, bad, amateur and professional. This is uncompromising behind-the-scenes action where you'll meet the real personality behind 11 actors, eight of them new.  Some dream of becoming porn stars without much talent, the others - the modest - are total sex bombs and they're the ones who'll be chosen for a more important role in a future film.
title: Duos de choc
